overview:
Antoine started his career in the ad/media agency world in france, norway and the uk. He quickly specialized in mobile marketing, then founded (2003) his own mobile marketing agency in France, that he later sold to Aegis Media / Isobar, and became global head of mobile for Aegis / Isobar.

In 2011, while he remains CEO at Marvellous, Aegis/Isobar’s 30 staff-strong mobile agency in France, he started a new venture with Aegis Media France former CEO, Guillaume Multrier. This is youmag, a digital magazine that revamps your news reading experience around the topics you care about most.

youmag (launching Q4 2011) is backed by business angel Laurent Ascher.
